version_description:
1.Support English, Arabic, Spanish, Portuguese and other languages.
2.Support Picture in Picture for iOS 14.
3.New Feedback feature, tell us what you want.
4.Better Music playback experience when in background.

1、Update pictures and copy materials for better localization support.
2、Added function guide to help you get started quickly.
3、Fix mini video player gesture to drag progress.
4、Fix bugs, better experience.

1.The browser operation bar is fully upgraded, making the experience more comfortable.
2.Bug fixed, more stable and smooth to use.
Bug fixed, more stable and smooth to use.

1、Fix crash on iOS 9.
2、Update official website address.

1、A new local music playback experience
2、Supports importing files via Wi-Fi
3、Bug fix
Fix that playing video will cause the page to become unresponsive
Fix crash on iOS 9.0

1.Update product screenshot material
2.Optimize in-product guidelines

1. Fix crash when deleting local files.
2.Fix Bug for music playback.

1、Turn on your notification to get the most popular content.
2、Crash fix on playback.

1、More convenient and faster access to your favorite playlist.
2、Improved application stability.
Fix the crash of search bar in iOS 12.

1、Mini play bar player，a new music playback experience, click the headset on the floating window to experience it now!
2、Bug Fixed.

- Snaptube Premium is coming, enjoy Snaptube AD-FREE.
- Video ads can also be blocked now.
- YouTube playlist can also be played in background and off-screen.

- Download video from zapee
- Download files
- Remove some ads
Bug fixes and stability improvements
Bug fixes and performance optimization
Bug fix and user experience optimization.
